court vulgar call budge court meat drink ſcot free ſo fr avoir bouche court ordinary court anciently extended well court nobleman subject king court appears deed ceſte endenture faite parentre lui noble hommes monſieur tho beauchamp counte de warwyke une part monſieur johan ruſſell de strengeſham chivalier dautre part teſmoigne que le dit mounſieur johan eſt demoure ove le dit counte pur terme de ſa vie pur la pee pur guerre prendra pur la pee du dit counte annuelement vynt livres de la vie du dit mounſieur johan del manoir le dit counte de chedworth en le countee de glouceſtre pur la guerre quarant livres ſerra paie annuelement termes de la nativitee seinte john le baptiſte de nowel per ovels portion de iſſues du dit manoir de chedworth per le main del gardeyn de meſme le manoir avera le dit monſ johan pur la pee quant il ſerra maunde de venir al dit counte bouche au court pur lui meſme un chamberlein un garſon feyn provendre ferrure pur trois chivaulx pur la temp de ſa demoure et pur la guerre le dit monſ johan mountra lui meſme covenablement avera bouche au court ou liverie pur lui meſme une chamberlein trois garſons ou gage al afferant feyn provendre ferrure pur cynk chivaulx en manere come autre de ſon eſtat ove le dit counte prendront et ſi il preigne priſoner ſoit entre le dit counte le dit monſ johan ſi come il fait parentre lui autres bachulers de ſa retenue pur terme de vie et voet grante le dit counte per ceſtes preſentes lettres que ſi la dite rent annuele de xx l pur la pee ou de xl l pur laguerre ſoit derere nyent paye pur un moy apres aſcun de termes avantditz que bien liſe au dit monſ johan ou ſon attornie en celle partie en le dite manoir de chedworth deſtreindre pur le arrerages de la dite rent c done noſtre chaſtel de warwyke le xxix jour del moys de marcz lan du regne le roy richard second puis le conqueſt ſiſme boveria oxhouſe oxſtall—ad faciendum ibi boverias ſuas alias domos uſibus ſuis neceſſarias c mon angl 2 par fol 210 paſſed thereby caſe ſuch fine enure way extinguiſhment right altering eſtate poſſeſſion cognizee perhaps bettering weſt symbol ſect 20 touching form theſe fine conſidered upon writ action concord made moſt commonly upon writ covenant muſt firſt paſs pair indenture cognizor cognizee whereby cognizor covenant cognizee paſs fine ſuch ſuch thing day limited theſe indenture firſt proceeding ſo ſaid lead ardung lat cuſtos signifies generally hath charge cuſtody perſon thing moſt notoriouſly hath education protection ſuch people ſufficient diſcretion guide themſelves affair child ideots indeed largely statute 12 car 2 cap 24 ordains perſon hath ſhall childe child age twenty one year married time death ſhall lawful father ſuch childe child whether born time deceaſe father time ventre ſa mere whether ſuch father within age twenty one year full age déed executed life time laſt teſtament writing preſence two credible witneſſes diſpoſe cuſtody tuition ſuch childe child time ſhall remain age leſſer original grant land tenement way fee lord onely tye tenant certain service alſo took ſubmiſſion promiſe oath true loyal lord benefactor ſubmiſſion called homage form whereof 17 edw 2 stat 2 theſe word freeman ſhall homage lord hold chief ſhall hold hand together hand lord ſhall ſay thus become man day forth life member worldly honour ſhall owe faith land hold ſaving faith owe unto soveraign lord king mine lord manner lord fee homage due take homage every tenant come land fee glanv lib 9 ca 1 except woman perform homage husband yet fitz nat br fol 157 ſayes contrary becauſe homage ſpecially relates ſervice war ſays alſo conſecrated biſhops homage onely fealty reaſon may one yet archbiſhop canterbury homage knee king coronation read biſhop iſle man homager earl derby fulbec reconciles fol 20 theſe word law religious man may homage may ſay lord ego devenio homo veſter becauſe profeſſed himſelf onely god man may ſay unto homage ſhall faithful loyal see britton ca 68 homage either new fee anceſtrel homage alſo uſed jury court baron becauſe commonly conſiſts ſuch owe homage lord fee homage uſed countreys well wont called hominium see hotoman de verbis feud verbo homo homage aunceſtrel infangthef juſtitia cognoſcentis latronis ſua eſt de homine ſuo ſi captus fuerit ſuper terram ſuam c infangthef quod latrones capti dominio vel feodo prioris de latrocinio convicti curia domini prioris judicentur ad furcas ejus ſuspendentur ex reg priorat de cokesford see bracton lib 3 tract 2 cap 35 ſays inter al et dicitur infangethef latro captus terra alscujus de hominibus ſuis propriis ſeiſitus latrocinio utfangthefe verò dicitur latro extraneuae veniens aliunde de terrâ alienâ qui captus fuit terrâ ipſius qui tale habet libertates c see alſo sir hen spelmans learned gloſſarium forma pauperis man hath juſt cauſe sure chancery make affidavit worth five pound debt paid upon petition maſter roll ſhall admitted ſue forma pauperis ſhall council clerk aſſigned without paying fee see gule auguſt landa laren open field without wood robertus come legreceſtriae radulpho pincernae omnibus baronibus fidelibus ſuis ſalutem sciatis dediſſe ſervo dei malgero monacho eleemoſina parvam landam quae eſt inter lunbreodam coptieleiam ad manſiones oratorium ibidem faciend teſtibus c sine dat landboc sax land terra boc liber charter deed whereby land tenement held given—ut praefata abbatiſſa praenominatam terram ſcil centum manentium cum libris quos angli dicunt landboc—in perpetuam haereditatem traderet concil synodale apud cloveſho anno dom 822 sic anglosaxones chartas henricus 3 dei gratia rex c dilectis fidelibus ſuis philippo de ulecot sociis ſuis juſticiariis itinerantibus comitatibus cumberland weſtmerland lancaſter salutem quia dubitatum fuit non determinatum ante inceptionem itineris veſtri quo judicio deducendi ſunt illi qui rectati ſunt de latrocinio murdro incendio hiis ſimilibus cum prohibitum ſit per eccleſiam romanam judicium ignis aqua pro • iſum eſt concilio noſtro ad praeſens hac itinere ſic fiat de rectatis de hujuſmodi exceſſibus viz quod illi qui rectati ſunt de criminibus praedictis majoribus de eis habeatur ſuſpicio quod culpabiles ſint de eo unde rectati ſunt de quibus etiam licet regnum noſtrum abjurarent adhuc ſuſpicio eſſet quod poſtea malefacerent teneantur priſona noſtra ſalvo cuſtodiantur ita quod non incurrant periculum vitae vel membrorum occaſione priſonae noſtrae illi vero qui mediis criminibus rectati fuerint quibus competeret iudicium ignis vel aqua ſi non eſſet prohibitum de quibus ſi regnum noſtrum abjurarent nulla fuerit poſtea male faciendi ſuſpitio regnum noſtrum abjurent illi vero qui minoribus rectati fuerint criminibus nec de eis fuerit mali ſuſpitio ſalvos ſecuros plegios inveniant de fidelitate pace noſtra conſervanda ſic dimittantur terra noſtra cum igitur nihil certius providerit hac parte conſilium noſtrum ad praeſens relinquimus diſcretioni veſtrae hunc ordinem praedictum obſervandum hoc itinere veſtro ut qui perſonas hominum formam delicti ipſarum rerum veritatem melius cognoſcere poteritis hoc ordine ſecundum diſcretiones conſcientias veſtras hujuſmodi procedatis et cujus rei salopesbirid quod habeant palmatas bladi farin • de omnibus ſaccis qui cum blado farina exponuntur ad vendendum morcato salopeshiriae tam diebus mercati quam aliis ſicut ea habuerunt tempore hen regis patris noſtri de dono elemoſyna ejuſdem regis ſc de unoquoque ſacco bladi palmatam duarum manuum de ſacco farinae palmatam unius manus ſicut ea habuerunt de dono elemoſyna praedicti regis dicbus ſuis ſicut ea modohabent habore debent quare volumus c dat per manum praepoſiti beverlaci archid wellenſis apud wudeſtoke xix die marcii anno regni noſtri quinto pandoxatrix—item utimur de pandoxatricibus quod nemo poteſt braſiare ſive pandoxare villa burgo noſtro niſi per redemptionem aliquam factam ad voluntatem comburgenſium noſtrorum ſi talis pandoxatrix braſiaverit aſſiſam domini noſtri regis burgo villa poſitam proclamatam fregerit tunc debet per balivos amerciari ad voluntatem balivorum noſtrorum non per pares ſuos primo ſecundo ſi tercia vice aſſiſam fregerit debet capi per balivos aſſis anno 16 edw 1 motingh edwardus kaynel maria filia roberti de camma johannes bereſet matilda uxor ejus johanna ſoror ejuſdem matildae petunt verſus johannem alfrith de warham unum toftum cum pertin warham de quo johannes gerard conſanguineus predictorum edwardi mariae matildae johannae cujus heredes ipſi ſunt fuit ſcifitus dominico ſuo ut de feodo dic quo obiit c unde dicunt c et johannes venit dicit quod tenementa warham ſunt partibilia inter maſculos femellas dicit quod praedictus edwardus habet quaſdam gunnoram matildam chriſtianam albredam eufemiam ſorores participes ipſius edwardi commanding proclaim none caſt filth ditch place near adjoyning caſt already remove founded upon statute 12 rich 2 cap 13 fitz nat br fol 176 pourpartie propars propartis vel propartia contrary pro indiviſo make pourpartie divide ſever land fall parceners partition hold joyntly pro indiviſo old nat br fol 11 pourpreſture pourpreſtura fr pourpris cloſe encloſure thus defined glanvile lib 9 cap 11 pourpreſtura eſt proprie quando aliquod ſuper dominum regem injuſte occupatur ut dominicis regis vel vii publicis obſtructis vel aquis publicis tranſverſis recto curſu vel quando aliquis civitate ſuper regiam plateam aliquid aedificando occupaverit generaliter quoties aliquid fit ad nocumentum regii tenementi vel regii viae vel civitatis crompton juriſ fol 152 thus pourpreſture properly man take himſelf encroaches thing ought whether juriſdiction land franchiſe generally thing done nuſance king tenant see kitchin fol 10 manwood par 1 pag 269 par 2 cap 10 author make three ſorts offence dediſſe—ricardo peſhale filio humfridi peſhale scutum armorum meorum habend tenend ac portand utend ubicunque voluerit ſibi haeredibus ſuis imperpetuum ita quod nec ego nec aliquis alius nomine meo quod decimarum tres ſunt ſpecies quaedam perſonales quae debentur ex opere perſonali ut artificio scientia militia negotiatione c quaedam praediales quae proveniunt ex praediis ex fructibus praediorum ut blada vinum faenum linum cannabum c ſeu ex fructibus arborum ut poma pyra pruna volema ceraſa fructus hortorum c quaedam mixtae ut de caſeo lacte c aut ex faetibus animalium quae ſunt paſcuis gregatim paſcuntur ut agni vitulis haedis capreolis pullis c ex praedialibus ſunt quaedam majores quaedam minutae majores ut frumentum ſiligo zizania faenum c minores ſive minutae quidam dicunt ſunt qui proveniunt ex menta aneto oleribus ſimilibus juxta illud dictum domini luc 11 42 vae qui decimatis mentam rutam c alii dicunt quod anglia conſiſtunt decimae minutae lino quae ſunt praediales lana lacte caſeis decimis animalium agni pullis ovibus decimae etiam mellis cerae numerantur inter minutas quae ſunt mixtae vide lindwood cap de decimis layman theſe later time taking ſmall occaſions libertates habuerunt ipſe omnes anteceſſores ſui eiſdem uſi ſunt tempore quo non extat memoria eo warranto clamat c et hugo de lowther qui ſequitur pro domino rege dicit quod wayf eſt quoddam groſſum de corona ita corona domini regis annexum quod nullus eo gaudere poſſit niſi inde habeat ſpeciale warrantum domino rege vel anteceſſoribus ſuis conceſſum weyf si aliquis adduxerit aliqua animalia ut oves boves equos hujuſmodi vel aliquas alias re inde ſuspectus arreſtatus fuerit balivis prioris donec probaverit per fideles homines quod illae re furatae non fuerant ille dimiſſus non redierit dictae re ſeu animalia ſervabuntur per unum annum unum diem ſi ille non redierit re ſuas eſſe probaverit erunt prioris c si aliquis alius venerit re ſuas legitime eſſe probaverit datis expenſis illas habebit ex regiſtro prior de cokesford wainnable may ploughed manured tillable—dedimus—in loco qui vocatur shiplade la moreis la terre wainnable la bruere c carta rogeri de scale sine dat wainage taper myne bed another fete ne ſtone ne thinge wherby eny man may witte ſtynkyng careyne liggeth chirche myne executor thingis owen duly ſuch caas without eny coſt ſaaf pore men alſo pray survyvors myne executor eny dette eny man kan axe true title hit payd yf eny man kan trewly ſey eny harme body good ye make largely grée whyles goody wole ſtrecche wole alſoe none myne executor meddle mynyſtre
